snippet: The nurse, Pauline Cafferkey, the first person found to have Ebola on British soil, returned to Britain on Dec. 28 from Sierra Leone.
lead_paragraph: The nurse, Pauline Cafferkey, the first person found to have Ebola on British soil, returned to Britain on Dec. 28 from Sierra Leone.

headline.main: Britain: Nurse Infected With Ebola Is in Critical Condition, Hospital Says
headline.print_headline: Britain: Nurse Infected With Ebola Is in Critical Condition, Hospital Says
